dotnetType.name: ByteResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Byte" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.Byte" />;
            an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves byte (8-bit unsigned integer) type information.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ByteResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
